thread.title: EastEnders viewers STUNNED as Denise Fox discovers Emerald isn't really her mum in explosive row
thread.title_full: EastEnders viewers STUNNED as Denise Fox discovers Emerald isn't really her mum in explosive row

author: Hayley Minn
title: EastEnders viewers STUNNED as Denise Fox discovers Emerald isn't really her mum in explosive row
text:
EastEnders viewers STUNNED as Denise Fox discovers Emerald isn't really her mum in explosive row And it also means the BBC soap character isn't sisters with Kim Hubbard! Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Denise finds out she's adopted in EastEnders Share this video Get soaps updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Denise Fox was left stunned when Emerald dropped the massive bombshell she’s not really her mum during an explosive argument on EastEnders . 
Diane Parish ’s character laid into Emerald for being a terrible mum during a huge row - mainly due to the fact she was left to bring up Kim while their mum hit the bottle. 
However, Emerald hit back with a HUGE bombshell – Denise is not really her daughter, meaning she and Kim Hubbard aren’t really sisters! 
The Minute Mart worker - who recently gave away her son - reeled in shock as Emerald told her that she took her in as a baby after Denise's 'uncle' brought her home. Read More Emerald dropped the massive bombshell she's not Denise's mum (Photo: BBC) Denise was devastated (Photo: BBC) 
To make matters worse, she also confessed they don’t even know who Denise’s real mother is. 
She said to Denise: "I might not have carried you Denise, but I don't stop being your mum just because you found out. 
“A bad mum, maybe, but still a mum.” And it means she and Kim aren't sisters (Photo: BBC) Viewers were just as sad as Denise (Photo: BBC) 
However, instead of staying to explain further to Denise and Kim, Emerald fled in a taxi back to Montserrat. 
Following Denise’s devastating news, EastEnders viewers rushed to Twitter to reveal their shock. 
One exclaimed: “Woah that was a shocker in #eastenders tonight at the fact Denise & Kim aren't Sister's :O.” Read More 'Scared' EastEnders star Kierston Wareing suffers broken arm in pub assault Emerald just swanned off (Photo: BBC) 
Another angry viewer blasted: “I do like shocking and exciting storylines but to make Denise and Kim not sisters is wrong, #EastEnders will never be the same again.” 
A third wrote: “This show to me won't EVER feel the same way again if Denise & Kim are not sisters. Honestly scarred by this. #EastEnders @bbceastenders.” 
*EastEnders continues on BBC One tomorrow at 7.30pm Like us on Facebook
